english.segment1: You made the world. Created time. You spoke into the darkness. It exploded in light
english.segment2: Out of the ground. You formed a man. By Your breath. All life began
english.segment3: I could never understand that kind of power if I tried. And how You use it to transform my life
english.segment4: (Chorus). I can feel your energy. You are my life. The current runnin' through my veins. You're the power inside of me. When I am weak. Fill me with your energy
english.segment5: There are days. I'm feelin the crunch. Trying hard to figure out. How to live up
english.segment6: I'll never deserve. The gift that you gave. Of how You love me in a million ways
english.segment7: Without You there my world would stop and fall from space. There's nothing more electric than Your grace
english.segment8: (Bridge). Deep enough to last forever. Strong enough to change a heart. Big enough to change the universe. It measures off the charts.
